frontmatter.name: Anna Roisman
frontmatter.bio: Anna Roisman is a comedian, host, writer, actress and content creator. Anna is known for her work as the host of HQ Words and HQ Trivia, on the Emmy Nominated App. She was a regular comedian/talking head on the viral Buzzfeed series, Did You See This? (12M views) and the 90’s throwback series That Literally Happened! Anna has hosted shows for Amazon, Buzzfeed, MTV, Microsoft, and more. Recently Anna wrote and starred in sketches for NBC’s Celebrity Sleepover. Anna's work has been featured in The NY Times, LA Times, Huffington Post, Vulture, Buzzfeed, Funny Or Die, Ad Week, People, WhoHaha, MTV, Comedy Central, Elite Daily, and more. She is the creator and host of the podcast, “Unemployed With Anna Roisman,” a spinoff of her long running live stream show, The Unemployed Show which was a finalist at the 2018 NYTVF in the TruTV competition.
